summary: Ghunzul of Cracked Tusk Keep has been fighting the good orc fight for a long time, and he has the gear to prove it!
descriptionHtml:
?————————————————————————————————————————————V-E-T-E-R-A-N-'S———I-R-O-N———————————————————————————?
Ghunzul, son of Shelakh, son of Mog, son of Grul, son of Durgob, son of Uzgakh, son of Ramolg, son of Othmash has had much passed down to him, including these well seasoned iron cuirass and gauntlets. Don't let the smell dissuade you, this armor has seen many-a-battle and will serve you well.
?—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————?

[youtube]2NAPzfG03Qk[/youtube]


?—A-R-M-O-R—R-A-T-I-N-G—?
The armor is rated at slightly higher than banded iron armor.

Veteran's Iron Breastplate.............32
Veteran's Iron Fisticuffs................12

? Veteran's Iron Set - wearing both pieces of armor grants 10% more melee damage dealt and 10% less melee damage taken.


?—C-R-A-F-T-I-N-G—?
The Cuirass and Gauntlets can be improved at any forge and requires corundum ingots. The armor is also enchantable.


?—L-O-C-A-T-I-O-N—?
Ghunzul is located in Cracked Tusk Keep, a ruined fortress, west of Falkreath City.
author: Edhelsereg

files.name: Veterans Iron Armor
files.changelogHtml:
Added set perk
Gear can now recieve enchantments
Armor rating tweaked
Fixed bump/normal map
